ðŸ“– Summary: Glom is a Python library and CLI tool designed for restructuring and accessing data within nested structures. It provides path-based access, declarative transformations, and debugging features, simplifying complex data manipulation. Glom aims to make working with real-world, nested data more manageable and less error-prone.
